Translations.Text: Tiandi de chuangzao, zhouye de lunliu, zai you lizhi de ren kan lai, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang

Tamen zhanzhe, zuozhe, tangzhe jinian an la, bing siwei tiandi de chuangzao,(tamen shuo):“Women de zhu a! Ni meiyou turan di chuangzao zhege shijie. Women zansong ni chaojue wanwu, qiu ni baohu women, mian shou huo yu de xingfa
Women de zhu a! Ni shi shei ru huo yu, ni que yi lingru sheile. Bu yi de ren, jue meiyou yuanzhu zhe

Women de zhu a! Women que yi tingjian yige zhaohuan de ren, zhao ren yu zhengxin,(ta shuo):‘Nimen dang quexin nimen de zhu.’ Women jiu quexinle. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni she you women de zui'e, qiu ni xiaochu women de guoshi, qiu ni shi women yu yi renmen si zai yi chu
Women de zhu a! Ni ceng jie zhong shizhe de kou er yingxu women de enhui, qiu ni ba ta shangci women, qiu ni zai fuhuo ri buyao lingru women. Ni que shi bu shuangyue de.”

Tamen de zhu yingdale tamen:“Wo jue bu shi nimen zhong renhe yige xingshan zhe tulao wu chou, wulun ta shi nan de, haishi nu de——nannu shi xiangsheng de——. Qianju yixiang, bei ren quzhu zhe, wei zhu dao er shouhai zhe, canjia zhandou zhe, bei di sha si zhe, wo bi xiaochu tamen de guoshi, wo bi shi tamen jin na xia lin zhu he de leyuan.” Zhe shi cong an la fachu de baochou. An la nali, you youmei de baochou
Bu xindao de ren, wanglai sifang, ziyou fazhan, ni buyao rang zhe jian shi qipian ni
na shi xiewei de xiangshou, jianglai tamen de guisu shi huo yu, na wo ru zhen elie
Jingwei zhu de ren, que de xiangshou xia lin zhu he de leyuan, er yong ju qizhong. Zhe shi cong an la nali fachu de kuandai. Zai an la nali de endian, duiyu yi ren shi geng youyi de

Xinfeng tian jing de ren zhong, dique youren xinyang an la, xinyang nimen suo shou de qishi, he tamen suo shou de qishi; tongshi, tamen shi jing shi an la de, tamen bu yi an la de jixiang huanqu xiewei de daijia, zhe deng ren, jiang zai tamen de zhu nali xiangshou tamen de baochou. An la que shi qingsuan shensu de zhu
Xindao de renmen a! Nimen dang jianren, dang fendou, dang jiebei, dang jingwei an la, yibian nimen chenggong
